HighEraCore.name: High Era Core
HighEraCore.environment: Clean, well-maintained networks of civic and technical infrastructure.
HighEraCore.political: Cooperative governance with strong BHA influence.
HighEraCore.era: Peak stability immediately before visible drift onset.

HighEraNetwork.name: High Era Network
HighEraNetwork.environment: Interconnected ports and corridor stations operating at full civilian throughput.
HighEraNetwork.tone: Assumed reliability disrupted by early anomalies.
HighEraNetwork.political: Moderate oversight; dependency on corridor accuracy.
HighEraNetwork.era: Late High Era, pre-collapse transport routines.

OuterBand.name: Outer Band
OuterBand.environment: Peripheral habitats, industrial decks, and stressed engineering corridors.
OuterBand.political: Underserved by Core institutions; rising proto-Shard sentiment.
OuterBand.era: High Era decay into early Post-Break improvisation.

CollapseZone.name: Collapse Zone
CollapseZone.environment: Severe corridor instability, ruptured nodes, and unpredictable geometry.
CollapseZone.tone: Acute danger and escalating structural failure.

PostBreakMixed.name: Post-Break Mixed Territories
PostBreakMixed.environment: Fragmented settlement clusters with partially functioning infrastructure.
PostBreakMixed.tone: Cooperation strained by scarcity and faction divergence.
PostBreakMixed.political: Temporary alliances, contested authority, emerging doctrines.

PostBreakHidden.name: Post-Break Hidden Sites
PostBreakHidden.environment: Isolated, intentionally concealed labs and safe rooms.
PostBreakHidden.era: Post-Break intellectual and doctrinal seeding period.

PostBreakCore.name: Post-Break Core Fragments
PostBreakCore.environment: Ruins of former Core command facilities and civic centers.
PostBreakCore.political: Residual BHA influence mixed with emerging proto-Crown dynamics.
PostBreakCore.era: Early transition from collapse to new doctrinal identities.
